title: Pazhangalla Vishamulla Lyrics Irandam Ulagam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Pazhangalla Vishamulla
Singer: Dhanush
Movie: Irandam Ulagam
Music: Harrrish Jeyaraj		 .

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Pazhangalla vishamulla
oru koodha kaathu killa
un kobam enna kolla
adi sondham irundhum
bandham irundhum
paavi nenju eriyum
Oru paithiyam pudicha
pournami nilavu
megatha kiichi aeriyum (2)

Ponnu manasu oru dhinusu
adhil mirugamum dheivamum vazhum
enna pannaadhu mirugam
oruvandhu koothaadum dheivam
ava nenapa purivadhila
oru aambala pozhapu aliyum

Nee konjam pola mella sirikka
athaadi ennapanni naan tholikka
Paarvayaal irudhayam ninaikatuma
padhatha imaigalil varudatumaa
nee sollum varthaiku vasikatumaa
kobatha kondaadi rasikatumaa

Pazhangalla vishamulla
oru koodha kaathu killa
un kobam enna kolla
adi sondham irundhum
bandham irundhum
paavi nenju eriyum
Oru paithiyam pudicha
pournami nilavu
megatha kiichi aeriyum

Ulagathula thambathiyaa
serndhirupathu onnu rendu
ada veliyila serndhirukum
veetukulla kattil mattum
rendu irukkum
Yen vidhiye idhudhaanaa
perundhinavuku ...thaana

en raathiri eriyuthadi
thookamilla ragasiyam odayuthadi
karbathin .. vazhandhavale
kadhalin thimiruku pirandhavle
karunayaal idhayathai kondruvidu
kallarayil ennaodu vazhndhu vidu

yela yaelaa ..yele yaela
oru koodha kaathu killa
un kobam enna kolla
adi sondham irundhum
bandham irundhum
thaane thaane thaana
Oru paithiyam pudicha
pournami nilavu
hmm..

idhukumela enna solradhuEnglish Translation
